dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: “Hello, I am hoping that we can all get along! Especially you ladies!” *Sparkle*

dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: I tried to use my signature move, the Pretty-boy Sparkle! It is a sure-fire way to get all the ladies to notice me Senpai!

dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: ...At least that was the plan, but they are all looking away! What!? Why!? What did I do!? M-my powers? Have they left me?
